coverage.title: Coverage
coverage.item_generale:
Captina provides quality consulting services in embedded systems area.
Starting from the software and its functionalities,
Captina not only help you find the best BSP that fit your requirements,
but can also help you in your hardware Design
Captina can also drive everything for you as your technical manager :
coverage.item_1_1: Captina help you identify your needs, and answer the need, not the question !
coverage.item_2_1: provides support for 3rd party and partner boards;
